message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this exceptional item, I am offering it to you for $200. I understand that value can be subjective, so please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality you mentioned, $200 is a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and I appreciate your interest in our product. In light of that, I am willing to negotiate the price down to $175. This still reflects the value of the product, but I hope it brings us closer to reaching an agreement that suits both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $175 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to split the difference and pay $162.50. If you're willing to accept that, I'm ready to finalize the purchase.
